reviews.review_msg: Wonderful, wonderful prof with a great lecture style. He will whip your writing into shape (that's why he will 'make you work for it') and genuinely cares about your grade and your academic experience. Sarcastic quips are incredibly appreciated in his class (within reason)-- seriously! Take this man's class! You will NOT regret it.

Incredible professor who actually cares about whether or not his students understand what he is trying to teach them. Goes out of his way to meet with students and answer questions. One tip: DO the readings. He will expect you to come to class with something to say about what you've read. So, just make it easy for yourself and be prepared.
